data.title: Seattle International Film Festival 1982 Archive
data.text:

Zigeunerweisen - dir. Seijun Suzuki, 1980, Japan

An Evening with Paul Morrissey - included Forty Deuce, Madame Wang’s

Guilty Pleasures or: “Yes it’s trash, but it’s really great trash” - included Susan Slade, The Egyptian, Start the Revolution without Me, Lifeguard, A Summer Place

Midnight Blue - included The Fruits of Passion, Maitresse, Business is Business, Taboo (The Single and the L.P.), The Lovers

Natalie Wood - included West Side Story, Splendor in the Grass, Gypsy, Love with the Proper Stranger, Inside Daisy Clover, This Property is Condemned

Short Subjects Competition - included 29 animated and live-action shorts

Wrong is Right
